data.message: You need to up your game Coca Cola - old plastic bottles washing up on the shore.  Why can't we return them to you for reuse?  This one found on an otherwise beautiful beach today. Markie

replies.message: Hi Markie, thanks for getting in touch. We have a new plan to see all of our packaging recovered so that none ends up where it shouldn’t. The first step is to double the amount of recycled plastic in our bottles to 50% by 2020. We’ll also launch our biggest ever ad campaign to inspire more of our consumers to recycle and champion new ways to improve packaging recovery. For more info, please visit: http://spr.ly/61838qqsd
Thanks - I'm pleased to see that
